.. _varian2pipe_1d:

convert example: varian2pipe_1d
===============================

This example shows how to use nmrglue to convert between the Varian and NMRPipe
file formats for a 1D data set.  The last block of code lists the differences
between this conversion and one performed with var2pipe.


[`source code <el/convert/varian2pipe_1d.py>`_]

.. literalinclude:: el/convert/varian2pipe_1d.py
